amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Park Service by $23.5 million and reduce Forest Service reconstruction and construction funding by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 33 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996 to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the National Park Service by $23,480,000 for operations of the National Park System and to reduce funds for the Forest Service for new road construction by a comparable amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 242 (Roll no. 255).
